shortDesc.message: Export and import cookies on the active Google Chrome browser tab to share and transfer active sessions

storeDesc.message:
Import Cookies is a simple and powerful Chrome extension designed for quick cookie import and export cookies actions directly from your active browser tab. Whether you are a developer, tester, or power user, this cookie importer and cookie exporter tool offers a fast and lightweight solution without unnecessary extras. üöÄ

With Import Cookies, you can easily chrome import cookies to restore sessions, migrate authenticated browsing environments, or continue your testing workflow on another device. You can also chrome export cookies in standard formats like chrome export cookies txt, making session management effortless.

This cookie editor extension is extremely helpful when working with login states, security tokens, and cross-environment testing. The ability to get token cookie or get cookies.txt allows flexible automation and seamless browser session handling.

3Ô∏è‚É£ keep your authenticated sessions synced between systems

No complex configuration, no confusing UI. Just a two-button cookie import and export cookies workflow. üí°
